title: Container Image Vulnerability Scan
description: An analyst must scan a new Docker container image for known vulnerabilities in its OS packages and libraries before it can be deployed to production.

tasks.description: Import the new Docker image into the container security scanning tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully loads the image into the scanner.

tasks.description: Launch the vulnerability scan against the image.
Analyze the results, identify a critical vulnerability in an underlying OS package, and fail the build, preventing the vulnerable image from being deployed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly identifies the risk and stops the insecure image from reaching production.
